tool_description: Generates personalized book recommendations based on user preferences, reading history, and advanced filtering criteria.

user_preferences.description: Array of user preference keywords or genres

liked_books.description: Array of book IDs the user has liked

disliked_books.description: Array of book IDs the user has disliked

exclude_genres.description: Array of genres to exclude from recommendations

min_rating.description: Minimum average rating for recommended books (0.0-5.0)

recommendation_strategy.description: Recommendation approach: collaborative, content_based, or hybrid

error_messages: Empty user_preferences: Provide at least one preference keyword or genre.
Invalid recommendation_count: Must be between 1 and 50.
Invalid diversity_factor: Must be between 0.0 and 1.0.
Invalid min_rating: Must be between 0.0 and 5.0.
Invalid recommendation_strategy: Use one of [collaborative, content_based, hybrid].
Insufficient data: Not enough user preference data to generate meaningful recommendations.
No books match criteria: All potential recommendations were filtered out by the specified constraints.
usage: Provide user_preferences array with genres or keywords the user enjoys. Optionally include liked_books and disliked_books for better personalization. Adjust diversity_factor to balance between similar and varied recommendations.

recommended_book_ids.description: Array of book IDs for recommended books

recommendation_reasons.description: Brief explanations for why each book was recommended

strategy_used.description: The recommendation strategy that was applied

diversity_achieved.description: Actual diversity score of the recommendation set (0.0-1.0)
